message: Bob, I'm feeling generous! Let's start with a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you right now, considering the inflation.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be real. How about a 55/45 split?  It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation will only make things worse later.
Okay Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a small hit and offer 52/48. This deal benefits us both in the long run. Take it before inflation eats away at the value even more!
